title: Colossal pouch

properties.name: description
properties.value: The colossal pouch is the largest of the five essence pouches and can hold 40 rune, pure, or daeyalt essence for use in the Runecraft skill. The pouch is made by using an abyssal needle to stitch together a small, medium, large, and giant pouch, which requires level 85 Runecraft and 56 Crafting to do; boosts will not work.[1]

SMW Subobject for NewExamine: A colossal-sized pouch used for storing essence.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Colossal pouchUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Colossal pouch.pngWeight: 1.000Value: 1200Version anchor: NewRelease date: 23 March 2022Item ID: 26784

The colossal pouch is the largest of the five essence pouches and can hold 40 rune, pure, or daeyalt essence for use in the Runecraft skill. The pouch is made by using an abyssal needle to stitch together a small, medium, large, and giant pouch, which requires level 85 Runecraft and 56 Crafting to do; boosts will not work.[1]

The pouch degrades based on essence stored rather than how often it is used. 320 essence (8 fills) can be stored before it degrades, after which the pouch degrades and holds less essence, starting at 35. Every two to three uses after results in one less essence that the pouch can hold. It can be repaired by talking to Dark mage either in person in the Abyss or through NPC Contact. Like other pouches, it does not degrade if the player is wearing a Runecraft cape or max cape when filling it.

Players cannot receive additional essence pouches if they own a colossal pouch. Should the player lose their colossal pouch, they must use a regular needle on the Rewards Guardian to obtain another abyssal needle, as well as reacquire the pouches.

When players create a colossal pouch, the chatbox will state "You attempt to stitch together all of the pouches. It's difficult, but you eventually craft a strange, kind of gross, fleshy container. It seems capable of storing up to 40 essence."

During the Devious Minds quest, a colossal pouch can be used to hold an orb. The pouch will be lost when used for the quest, requiring players to get another from the Rewards Guardian. The pouch must be in full condition to hold the orb, so players must repair a degraded pouch before using it in the quest.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 March 2022
(update) 		Hotfix

The small and medium pouches are no longer re-obtainable after creating the colossal pouch.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • If players attempt to use a normal needle, the game chat will state "The needle doesn't seem to be able to work with this kind of... material."
  • Using an abyssal needle on a colossal pouch results in the game chat stating "You don't want to poke the pouch with a needle again. It was bad enough the first time."

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 24 March 2022. (Archived from the original on 8 April 2022.) Mod Ash: "It checks this [base stats] when you're creating it [colossal pouch] too, and it looks to me like boosts wouldn't be accepted for either stat."

The '''colossal pouch''' is the largest of the five [[essence pouch]]es and can hold 40 [[rune essence|rune]], [[pure essence|pure]], or [[daeyalt essence]] for use in the [[Runecraft]] [[skill]]. The pouch is made by using an [[abyssal needle]] to stitch together a [[Small pouch|small]], [[Medium pouch|medium]], [[Large pouch|large]], and [[giant pouch]], which requires level 85 [[Runecraft]] and 56 [[Crafting]] to do; boosts will not work.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1507054773408784392|date=24 March 2022|archiveurl=https://archive.ph/K1sd9|archivedate=8 April 2022|quote=It checks this [base stats] when you're creating it [colossal pouch] too, and it looks to me like boosts wouldn't be accepted for either stat.}}

The pouch degrades based on essence stored rather than how often it is used. 320 essence (8 fills) can be stored before it degrades, after which the pouch degrades and holds less essence, starting at 35. Every two to three uses after results in one less essence that the pouch can hold. It can be repaired by talking to [[Dark Mage (Abyss)|Dark mage]] either in person in the Abyss or through [[NPC Contact]]. Like other pouches, it does not degrade if the player is wearing a [[Runecraft cape]] or [[max cape]] when filling it.

Players cannot receive additional essence pouches if they own a colossal pouch. Should the player lose their colossal pouch, they must use a regular [[needle]] on the [[Rewards Guardian]] to obtain another abyssal needle, as well as reacquire the pouches.

When players create a colossal pouch, the chatbox will state "''You attempt to stitch together all of the pouches. It's difficult, but you eventually craft a strange, kind of gross, fleshy container. It seems capable of storing up to 40 essence.''"

During the [[Devious Minds]] [[quest]], a colossal pouch can be used to hold an [[Orb (Devious Minds)|orb]]. The pouch will be lost when used for the quest, requiring players to get another from the Rewards Guardian. The pouch must be in full condition to hold the orb, so players must repair a degraded pouch before using it in the quest.
